message: Hey Geeks! What's the best approach to implement online payment process in ASP.NET MVC

data.message: Basically you defer the whole process to a 3rd party payment gateway. Some will require to have their own pages with particular styling and give you some control over the styles, some will allow you to render the form and submit to them, in all cases, you MUST not store credit card data (no, don't think about encrypting it or whatever, there're horrible legal issues to deal with if you do -at least in many countries-, and trust me, you won't implement it right the first or 5th time). You'll also need an SSL certificate to use for the payment form.

I don't know which payment gateways support paying to Egyptian bank accounts (or credit cards). This may be an OK starrt http://www.wamda.com/2013/02/payment-gateways-in-the-arab-world-2013-infographic or ask Egypreneur ريادي الأعمال المصري
actually, I'm looking for something based in Saudi Arabia, Thanks :)
If it's a big organization, talk to STC. If it's like UAE, most gov, semi-gov, and big organizations will use the biggest telco company as their payment processor.

frankly speaking, I'm looking for something for start-up project that requires to gather fees from online customers, most of the payment gateway that mentioned in the infographic support KSA, so I'll investigate more which one is suitable for the project.
Maybe consider Paypal for beginning, or Google Checkout, or Stripe (that's what Tekpub used) or BrainTree (used in Tekpub sample as well).
